name: Wayout
description: Relax, clear your mind and find the way out.

reviews.review_text: It's an interesting and sometimes very complicated puzzle game with nice visuals and great soundtrack.  Also I really apreciate the speed with which developers release bug-fixes.
You can be smart, you can be VERY smart. But at the end of the day, you'll end up smashing your mouse trying to get to the next level.
Fun, nice, and chill. Easy once you get the hang of it...  7/10

Love it. its relaxing and calm. if your having a bad day play this game trust me it helps! the music calms your down and the game takes your mind off of the bad thoughts. i recommend this mostly to people who have stress.
